features: Skin Care Set with four popular moisturizing Sheet Masks: Pretty Kitty, Wild Tiger, Sweet Panda and Happy Sea Calf. Our Facial masks hydrate, nourish, refresh and give tired skin beautiful shine. They look cute and have a pleasant fragrance

Pretty Kitty face mask with raspberry juice and lavender. Happy Sea Calf - with algae extract and white moss. Sweet Panda - with bamboo extract and soybean oil. Wild tiger sheet mask - with taiga berries and verbena
Easy to Use: These sheet masks are travel friendly and perfect for on-the-go beauty pampering. Simply unfold the mask, smooth it over your face, and let it work its magic while you relax and unwind

Sheet Face Masks Properties: moisturizing, nourishing, increasing strength and elasticity, restoring, saturating with vitamins, softening, smoothing. They work for all skin types: oily, dry, combination, sensitive and normal skin

Responsible Production: All our products are carefully formulated by the team of passionate skincare experts. They contain only high-quality ingredients and are proven to be Eco-friendly and Cruelty-free
description: Product Description WHAT’S IN THE SET? Face mask with Raspberry Juice and Lavender PRETTY KITTY Face mask with algae extract and white moss HAPPY SEA CALF Face mask with Bamboo extract and Soybean oil SWEET PANDA Face mask with Taiga Berries and Verbena WILD TIGER Perfect skin care + social media content = Animal masks! Animal masks combine a complex of skin care ingredients and a charge of great mood! Each of the masks are made in the form of a funny animal faces and have a unique function as a part of a skin care. Face sheet mask "Happy Sea Calf" Mask effect or what seals love: Freshness . Algae extract makes your skin fresh, increases skin elasticity and firmness. Energy . Iceland moss removes signs of fatigue. Extra moisturizing . The light, refreshing formula of shea and wheat germ oils perfectly moisturizes and nourishes your skin. Uniqueness . Put on the mask and look in the mirror. You stand out now, don’t you? Face sheet mask "Wild Tiger-r-r" Mask effect or what tigers love: Energy . Taiga berry extract has powerful properties that tone the skin and give it energy. Against fatigue: verbena effectively removes signs of fatigue and helps your skin look fresh and healthy for as long as possible. Effectiveness : Thanks to its unique formula, the mask is fast-acting and effective. You’ll see real results in just 20 minutes. Face sheet mask "Sweet Panda" Mask effect or what panda loves: Detox : bamboo extract stimulates cleansing and detoxifying processes in the epidermis while improving skin tone and elasticity. Complex care : the vitamin complex with Vitamins A, B, C and E has a deep regenerating effect that gives your skin the attentive care it needs. Smoothing : soybean oil makes your skin soft and smooth. Positivity : this mask will boost your spirits. Face sheet mask "Pretty Kitty" Mask effect or what kittens love: Softness : raspberry juice makes your skin soft and smooth. Lavender has a soothing effect and excellent restorative properties. Energy : Its vitamin formula has a deep regenerating effect that helps your skin look fresh. Playfulness : you’ll feel like purring when you put it on. WHAT ACTIVE INGREDIENTS ARE IN THE MASKS? Glycerin makes skin supple & maintains water balance Bamboo extract soothes the skin & maintains elasticity Raspberry juice reduces fine lines & strengthens skin barrier Aloe Vera gel prevents skin from dryness & flaking Oat oil boosts moisture levels & reduces redness Shea butter deeply nourishes & shields from damage Blackcurrant extract regenerates skin cells & calms inflammation Seaweed extract detoxifies the skin & balances oil production WHAT MAKES OUR MASKS UNIQUE? SUPERFOOD & HEALTHY OILS & VITAMIN COMPLEX х2 SERUM FOR EXTRA MOISTURIZING AND NUTRITION PARABEN FREE & CRUELTY FREE & NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS HOW TO USE Сlean your face Apply mask to face and leave for 10-15 minutes. While you’re waiting, take a selfie and post it to INSTAGRAM After removing the mask, massage your face Remove any remaining residue with a makeup remover towelette and rinse face with water

specifications_table.Special features: ‎Not Tested On Animals, Scented, Travel Size, Organic, Natural Ingredients
